mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ONEDAY (ONEDAY_SEQ, NOTE_SEQ, ONEDAY_DELFLAG, ONEDAY_TITLE, ONEDATE, REPORTCHK, ONE_READCNT, ONEDAY_PUBLIC) VALUES(SEQ_ONEDAY.NEXTVAL, #{note_seq}, 'N' , #{oneday_title}, #{onedate}, 'N', 0, 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT o.ONEDAY_SEQ, o.ONEDAY_TITLE, o.ONEDATE, p.ONEDAY_SEQ, p.PLACE_SEQ, p.STEP, p.PLACE_NAME, p.XLAT, p.YLNG, p.MEMO FROM ONEDAY o JOIN PLACE p ON o.ONEDAY_SEQ = p.ONEDAY_SEQ WHERE o.ONEDAY_SEQ=#{oneday_seq} ORDER BY p.STEP ASC

SELECT o.ONEDAY_SEQ , o.ONEDAY_TITLE, o.ONEDATE, p.PLACE_SEQ, p.STEP, p.PLACE_NAME, p.XLAT, p.YLNG, p.MEMO FROM ONEDAY o JOIN PLACE p ON o.ONEDAY_SEQ = p.ONEDAY_SEQ WHERE o.NOTE_SEQ = ${note_seq} AND ONEDAY_DELFLAG ='N' ORDER BY o.ONEDATE ASC,p.STEP ASC
